text: Andris Riherts (born 31 May 1981) is a Latvian football manager and a former footballer. Currently he is the manager of Latvian Higher League team FS METTA/Latvijas Universitāte. Andris Riherts is also an assistant coach of the Latvia national football team. ==External links== * * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Latvian footballers Category:Latvian football managers Category:Association football defenders Category:FK Auda players
title: Andris Riherts
